column2: "Thank you for your report. Let's have a look... Yes, this should do."
"I hereby lift the cap on advanced difficulty missions for you, <%me>."
"Now, some advice just for you. Now that your difficulty cap has been lifted, your battles will become harder from here on out."
"Even the hostiles you easily dealt with before will be far stronger and are sure to turn their attentions toward you."
"Franka has issued a client order.  Franka is at the east shopping plaza in the shop area."
"Girard has issued a client order.  Girard is at the west shopping plaza in the shop area."
"Kressida has issued a client order.  Kressida is at the east corridor in the shop area."

"ジグにクライアントオーダーが発生しました。

ジグはショップエリア・西休憩広場にいます。

EP1～3モードでは
EP3のマターボードを選択した場合のみ
クライアントオーダーを受注できます。"
